title: Important Update: MCA User Awareness Sessions on Annual Filing by ICSI
content:
# Important Update: MCA User Awareness Sessions on Annual Filing by ICSI

Ek important update hai. The Institute of Company Secretaries of India (ICSI) ne Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA) ke User Awareness Sessions announce kiye hain, specifically on Annual Filing. Yeh sessions stakeholders ko MCA-21 V3 portal par annual filings ki latest requirements aur procedures samajhne mein help karenge.

*   **What:** MCA User Awareness Sessions on Annual Filing.
*   **Organized by:** The Institute of Company Secretaries of India (ICSI).
*   **Dates:** These sessions are scheduled from January 21st to 23rd, 2026, and then from January 27th to 30th, 2026.
*   **Time:** All sessions will commence at 3 PM onwards.

Yeh sessions professionals aur corporates ke liye bahut beneficial honge to ensure smooth compliance with the new annual filing requirements on the MCA-21 V3 platform.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.icsi.edu/whats-new-icsi/)

*Published on: 22 January 2026*
